parameters.name: AssetsType
parameters.description: The asset type of the instance.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: PublicIp
parameters.description: The public IP address of the instance.

parameters.name: RegionNo
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: RiskLevel
parameters.description:
The risk level. If you leave this parameter empty, all risk levels are queried. Valid values:

*   **3**: high risk
*   **2**: medium risk
*   **1**: low risk
*   **0**: no risk

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.
